mapper.select: SELECT a.no, a.title, b.name, a.hit, a.reg_date, a.user_no, a.o_no, a.depth FROM board a JOIN user b ON a.user_no = b.no ORDER BY a.g_no DESC, a.o_no ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board VALUES(null, #{title }, #{contents }, 0, now(), (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(g_no)+1, 1) FROM board b), 1, 0, #{userNo })
